alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, southwestern St. Johns and eastern Putnam Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orange Mills to near Pomona Park. Movement was north to northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia, Bostwick, Federal Point, Orange Mills and San Mateo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
